preview_email.subject: Vorschau auf {kid_name}s Buch
preview_email.title: {kid_name}'s Storybook Preview
preview_email.intro: Congratulations on taking the first step in crafting {kid_name}'s magical book with Imagitime! Unlike any other personalized books, they're not just a name on a page; they're the star, brought to life through personalized illustrations. üåàüìñ
preview_email.preview_text: Your magical creation is underway! Feel free to refine it and show it to others by clicking the button below.
preview_email.questions_text:

admin_review_completed_email.subject: {kid_name}'s book will be given for printing soon (Order #{order_number})
admin_review_completed_email.title: {kid_name}'s book will be given for printing soon
admin_review_completed_email.intro: Thank you for creating {kid_name}'s book on Imagitime. Sharing below the digital version of the book for your reference.
admin_review_completed_email.printing_in:
Das Buch wird in K√ºrze zum Druck freigegeben.
Falls Sie beim Durchsehen noch √Ñnderungen vornehmen m√∂chten, klicken Sie bitte am Ende der Seite auf ‚ÄûZum Druck freigeben‚Äú.
admin_review_completed_email.delivery_in: As our book is custom-made for each order, it will take another {min_days} to {max_days} days for printing, shipping and delivery. We will share the shipment tracking details once it is dispatched from the printing facility.
admin_review_completed_email.questions_t: Bei Fragen k√∂nnen Sie sich gerne an uns wenden.
shipped_email.subject: {kid_name}'s book has been shipped (Order #{order_number})
shipped_email.title: {kid_name}'s book has been shipped
shipped_email.shipping_info: {kid_name} s buch ist unterwegs und wird innerhalb von {days} Tagen geliefert! Die Versanddetails finden Sie untenstehend.
shipped_email.questions_text: Please feel free to reply to us if you have any questions.
shipped_email.share_heading: Love Imagitime? Share it with Friends!
shipped_email.share_text: Spread the magic of personalized storybooks and help others create unforgettable memories.
any_issues_email.subject: Any issues with {kid_name}'s book? Let us know
any_issues_email.message_1: {kid_name}'s book (Order #{order_number}) was dispatched a few days back and we hope you have received it.
any_issues_email.message_2: If you have not received the book or if you have any complaints, please reply to this email and let us know. We will try our best to ensure that any issues are resolved promptly.
any_issues_email.footer: You received this email because you purchased a personalized book from us.
any_issues_email.unsubscribe: If you do not wish to receive these emails, please unsubscribe here.
delivered_email.subject: {kid_name}'s book has been delivered (Order #{order_number})
delivered_email.delivery_info: We're excited to inform you that {kid_name}'s personalized book from Imagitime has been delivered!
delivered_email.help_text: Sollten Sie das Buch nicht erhalten haben oder eine Beschwerde haben, antworten Sie bitte auf diese E-Mail und informieren Sie uns. Wir werden unser Bestes tun, um eventuelle Probleme schnell und zufriedenstellend zu l√∂sen.
delivered_email.thank_you: Thank you for choosing Imagitime to create magical memories for {kid_name}.
delivered_email.footer: You received this email because you purchased a personalized book from us.
delivered_email.unsubscribe: If you do not wish to receive these emails, please unsubscribe here.
out_for_delivery_email.subject: {kid_name}'s book is out for delivery (Order #{order_number})
out_for_delivery_email.delivery_info: Great news! {kid_name}'s personalized book from Imagitime is out for delivery today.
out_for_delivery_email.thank_you: Thank you for choosing Imagitime to create magical memories for {kid_name}.
out_for_delivery_email.questions: If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact our support team by replying to this message.
out_for_delivery_email.footer: Sie haben diese E-Mail erhalten, weil Sie bei uns ein personalisiertes Buch gekauft haben.
out_for_delivery_email.unsubscribe: If you do not wish to receive these emails, please unsubscribe here.
delivery_attempt_failed_email.subject: {kid_name}s Buch: Zustellversuch fehlgeschlagen (Bestellung Nr. #{order_number})
delivery_attempt_failed_email.attempt_in: We would like to let you know that {shipping_carrier} attempted to deliver {kid_name}'s personalized Imagitime book today, but the delivery attempt failed.
delivery_attempt_failed_email.reattempt_: {shipping_carrier} will usually try to reattempt the delivery or hold the package at their local facility.
delivery_attempt_failed_email.help_text: Need help? Simply reply to this email - we're here to make sure {kid_name}'s special book reaches you.
delivery_attempt_failed_email.footer: You received this email because you purchased a personalized book from us.
delivery_attempt_failed_email.unsubscrib: If you do not wish to receive these emails, please unsubscribe here.
could_not_deliver_email.subject: Could not deliver {kid_name}'s book (Order #{order_number})
could_not_deliver_email.delivery_issue: We are sorry to inform you that {shipping_carrier} could not deliver {kid_name}'s book.
could_not_deliver_email.address_confirm: Could you please confirm if the address and phone number mentioned below is complete and correct?
could_not_deliver_email.response_request: Looking forward to your reply so that we can find the right resolution.
could_not_deliver_email.closing:
Mit freundlichen Gr√º√üen
, Ihr Imagitime Team
could_not_deliver_email.footer: Sie haben diese E-Mail erhalten, weil Sie bei uns ein personalisiertes Buch bestellt haben.
could_not_deliver_email.unsubscribe: If you do not wish to receive these emails, please unsubscribe here.
review_collection_email.subject: Share your experience with {kid_name}'s personalized book
review_collection_email.title: We'd love to hear from you!
review_collection_email.thank_you: Thank you for creating and purchasing {kid_name}'s personalized book. We hope {kid_name} loved it.
review_collection_email.feedback_request: We would be thrilled if you could take a moment to share your experience and leave us a review. Your feedback will help spread the joy of our uniquely personalized books to more people.
review_collection_email.photo_request: If you captured a special moment of {kid_name} with the book, we would love for you to include that in your review. Photos bring experiences to life and showcase the real joy our books can bring!
review_collection_email.not_received: Haven't received the book? Just reply to this email and we'll resolve the issue.
review_collection_email.family_thank_you: Thank you for being part of our family. We can't wait to hear your story!
review_collection_email.footer: You received this email because you purchased a personalized book from us.
review_collection_email.unsubscribe: Wenn Sie diese E-Mails nicht mehr erhalten m√∂chten, klicken Sie bitte hier, um sich abzumelden.
